overview: On the exterior Priscila is a reserved and dignified woman. However, an invitation to an invite only affair unleashes the perverted imagination she possesses. In no time she finds herself being the center of attention, with her intimate caress, skillful mouth, and dominant personality she engages in every sexual game available. Priscila gets initiated, but will her sex drive prove to be too much to contain?
title: Priscila's Initiation
